wybug_title: 帝国文明官方网站爆物理路径
wybug_status: 未联系到厂商或者厂商积极忽略
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2011-03-06：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2011-03-06：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 帝国文明官方网站爆物理路径 详细说明：  http://dg.woniu.com/admin.php   漏洞证明：  Warning: Parameter 1 to Notice::onPrint() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/cms/dg/admin.php on line 481 Warning: Parameter 1 to Notice::onPrint() expected to be a reference, value given in /home/cms/dg/admin.php on line 481 Warning: date(): It is not safe to rely on the system's timezone settings. You are *required* to use the date.timezone setting or the date_default_timezone_set() function. In case you used any of those methods and you are still getting this warning, you most likely misspelled the timezone identifier. We selected 'Asia/Chongqing' for 'CST/8.0/no DST' instead in /home/cms/dg/admin.php on line 534    修复方案：  akast@ngsst.com   版权声明：转载请注明来源 akast@乌云
